Identification.LongTitle: Regulations Excluding Certain Buildings and Premises from the Definition “Hatchery”

Provision.Text: The Minister of Agriculture, pursuant to subsection 2(2) of the Health of Animals Act*, hereby makes the annexed Regulations excluding certain buildings and premises from the definition “hatchery”.
Dated at Ottawa, the 10th day of December, 1990

Section.Text: These Regulations may be cited as the Hatchery Exclusion Regulations.
The following buildings and premises are excluded from the definition hatchery:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: any buildings or premises that have an incubator capacity of less than 1,000 eggs; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: any buildings or premises that are not used to store for incubation chicken, turkey, duck, goose or game bird eggs.
